This is my Wonder Garden where seeds are planted, water and cultivated.

Intermidate Swift

 Jun 13, 2014
###Memory Manangement ###Initailization *Every object has to be initialized. *Initializers init(){} ###Closures
\n\n| \t\t\t|Swift\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t| C# |\n|Variable delcaration \t\t|`var s:String =\"hello word\"` \t\t\t\t|`String s =\"hello world\"; ` |\n|Constant \t\t\t\t|`let s:String = \"hello world\"` \t|`const String s = \"hello world\";` |\n|String format\t\t\t\t|`let result = \"\\(a) times \\(b) equal \\(a*b)\"`|`String.Format(\"{0} times {1} equal {3}\",a,b,a*b);`|\n|Array\t\t\t\t\t\t|`var names = [\"tom\",\"jerry\"]`\t\t\t\t|`string[] names = new string[]{\"tom\",\"jerru\"};`|\n|Dictionary\t\t\t\t\t|`var dic = [\"Jone\":34,\"Tim:33]`\t\t\t|`Dictionary dic = new Dictionary(){ {\"Jone\",34},{\"Tim\",33} };`|\n|While loop \t\t\t\t| `while condition{ function()}`\t\t\t|`while(condition){functions();}`|\n|For loop\t\t\t\t\t|`for var i=0;i<10;i++ { function(i)}`\t\t|`for var i=0;i<10;i++ { function(i);}`|\n|For in loop \t\t\t\t| `for s in [Arrary or Sring]{ function(s)}`|`foreach(var s in Arrary){function(s);}`|\n|Range\t\t\t\t\t\t|close `1...5`, half close `0..5`\t\t\t|`Enumerable.Range(1,5);`|\n|if statement\t\t\t\t|`if condition { function()} else { funciton() }`|`if (condition) { function();} else { funciton() ;}`|\n|switch statement \t\t\t|`switch legs {case 0: printlin() case 1, 3: println() case 4...8: println() default: printlin()}`|`switch (legs) {case 0: functions();break; case 1:case 3: function(); break; default: statements;}`|\n|Optional\t\t\t\t\t|`var name:Int?`\t\t\t\t\t\t\t|`Nullable name;`|\n|Unwrraping Optional\t\t|`if let nameOptional = unwrapped or nameOptional!`\t|`if(nullablename.HasValue) unwrapped = nullablename.Value;`|\n|Optional Chaining\t\t\t|`nameOptional?.subOptional.?subsubOptioanl.?tofuntion`| nested if statement|\n|function \t\t\t\t\t|`func functioname(para1:String,para2:Int)->String{}` |`String functionName(String para1,int para2){ }`|\n|function return tuple\t\t|`func functioname(para1:String,para2:Int)->(Int,String){ return (200,\"success\") }` |`Tuple functionName(String para1,int para2){ return Tuple.Create(200,\"success\");}`|\n|Closure\t\t\t\t\t|`{(paras)->(return type) in fucntions}\t\t|lamda expression `(a,b) =>{ statements }`|\n|Class\t\t\t\t\t\t| all properties(instance variable) and methods are public\t\t| have internal, private, protected decorator|\n|Class\t\t\t\t\t\t| `let instance = Class()`\t\t\t\t\t| `var instance = new Class()`|\n|Class\toverride baseClass method|add override before methods \t\t\t| use the same name in subclass|\n|Class property observer\t|willSet and didSet\t\t\t\t\t\t\t| custom implement at setter before/after value changed|\n|Structure \t\t\t\t\t|can has its own methods \t\t\t\t\t| yes we can too|\n|Enumerations\t\t\t\t|has Associated Values and the ability to infer| um??|\n|Extension\t\t\t\t\t|`extension Int{ func extMethod()}`|`public static void extMethod(this int value){}`|\n{:.table .table-bordered}", "relative_path"=>"_posts/2014-06-06-Learning-Swift.md", "path"=>"_posts/2014-06-06-Learning-Swift.md", "url"=>"/2014/06/06/Learning-Swift.html", "collection"=>"posts", "next"=>#, "previous"=>#, "id"=>"/2014/06/06/Learning-Swift", "draft"=>false, "categories"=>[], "date"=>2014-06-06 00:00:00 -0500, "layout"=>"default", "sublayout"=>"blog", "title"=>"Swift basic compared with C Sharp", "slug"=>"Learning-Swift", "ext"=>".md", "tags"=>[], "excerpt"=>"
Swift basic compared with C Sharp

Swift takes a lot common features of modern programing languages. C# is one of my primary programing language used at work, therefore I created a language basic comparsion table.

Swift basic compared with C Sharp

 Jun 06, 2014
#####Swift basic compared with C Sharp Swift takes a lot common features of modern programing languages. C# is one of my primary programing language used at work, therefore I created a language basic comparsion table. | |Swift | C# | |Variable delcaration |`var s:String ="hello word"` |`String s ="hello world"; ` | |Constant |`let s:String = "hello world"` |`const String s = "hello world";` | |String format |`let result = "\(a) times \(b) equal \(a*b)"`|`String.Format("{0} times {1} equal {3}",a,b,a*b);`| |Array |`var names = ["tom","jerry"]` |`string[] names = new string[]{"tom","jerru"};`| |Dictionary |`var dic = ["Jone":34,"Tim:33]` |`Dictionary dic = new Dictionary(){ {"Jone",34},{"Tim",33} };`| |While loop | `while condition{ function()}` |`while(condition){functions();}`| |For loop |`for var i=0;i<10;i++ { function(i)}` |`for var i=0;i<10;i++ { function(i);}`| |For in loop | `for s in [Arrary or Sring]{ function(s)}`|`foreach(var s in Arrary){function(s);}`| |Range |close `1...5`, half close `0..5` |`Enumerable.Range(1,5);`| |if statement |`if condition { function()} else { funciton() }`|`if (condition) { function();} else { funciton() ;}`| |switch statement |`switch legs {case 0: printlin() case 1, 3: println() case 4...8: println() default: printlin()}`|`switch (legs) {case 0: functions();break; case 1:case 3: function(); break; default: statements;}`| |Optional |`var name:Int?` |`Nullable name;`| |Unwrraping Optional |`if let nameOptional = unwrapped or nameOptional!` |`if(nullablename.HasValue) unwrapped = nullablename.Value;`| |Optional Chaining |`nameOptional?.subOptional.?subsubOptioanl.?tofuntion`| nested if statement| |function |`func functioname(para1:String,para2:Int)->String{}` |`String functionName(String para1,int para2){ }`| |function return tuple |`func functioname(para1:String,para2:Int)->(Int,String){ return (200,"success") }` |`Tuple functionName(String para1,int para2){ return Tuple.Create(200,"success");}`| |Closure |`{(paras)->(return type) in fucntions} |lamda expression `(a,b) =>{ statements }`| |Class | all properties(instance variable) and methods are public | have internal, private, protected decorator| |Class | `let instance = Class()` | `var instance = new Class()`| |Class override baseClass method|add override before methods | use the same name in subclass| |Class property observer |willSet and didSet | custom implement at setter before/after value changed| |Structure |can has its own methods | yes we can too| |Enumerations |has Associated Values and the ability to infer| um??| |Extension |`extension Int{ func extMethod()}`|`public static void extMethod(this int value){}`| {:.table .table-bordered}
